title: Let's identify this beautiful serif.
content:
Hi!

Does anyone know witch font is this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110513073941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/textoAndrew1_5592.jpg)
author: Ping-Ponger

comments.content:
Thank you Jan...

Dolly... Shame no me...

I'm almost positive the Underware EULA prohibits pink text on neon blue.

If it doesn't, it should.
... and using inch marks in, of all things, 'Central St. Matinâ€˜s School Of Arts' has got to be a deliberate irony... surely...
No use of fi-ligature either, buuu ;-) Dolly is a great typeface though!
